name: Verify return of list of available tables based on valid filters

steps.name: Given  the base_uri of the application
Given  user sends a sign in request with the following data
When  the user sends the post request to "/auth/sign-in" with the request payload
Then  the status code should be 201
When  the user sends the authorized get request to "/bookings/tables?locationId=LOC001&date=2025-08-02&time=15:00&guests=4" request payload
Then  the status code should be 200
And  the response should validate the "ValidateTables" schema
